title: Compete Against USA TODAY Sports Experts for March Madness
text:
This year for March Madness, sports fans can compete against USA TODAY Sports' editorial experts. Sponsored by Jeep, the Bracket competition will feature USA TODAY's Danielle Lerner, Scott Gleason, Shelby Mast, Jeff Sharagin, and Dan Wolken.

To participate, users must complete a full bracket by predicting the winning team for each of the 63 games associated with March Madness by tip off on Thursday, March 21st at 12 PM ET Points will be earned for a correct prediction which each point value differing as the tournament goes on.

To sign up and view the full rules, visit USA TODAY Sports.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/pr/2019/03/11/compete-against-our-experts-march-madness/3130724002/
description: This year for March Madness, our audience can compete against USA TODAY Sports' editorial experts
